Your trip to Rythmia will be here before you know it and we are so excited to welcome you with open arms. We're putting our hearts and souls into creating a truly miraculous experience for our guests. Below are the items I will need from you to make sure you arrival goes smoothly.

 

This is step 3 of 4

Mandatory information we need from you as soon as possible (Call +1(888) 825-3344 or email me at info@rythmia.com):

Your Pickup Information:

We can pick you up directly from your incoming flight arriving either at Liberia Airport (LIR) or Tamarindo Airport (TNO). Please let us know your airline, flight number, and arrival time. There will be a Rythmia driver holding a white Rythmia sign just as you exit the airport.

Alternatively, if you decide to stay in Costa Rica prior to your stay at Rythmia, we are authorized to pick up at the Hilton Garden Inn next to the Liberia Airport at 11AM on Saturdays and Sundays.

Emergency Contact Information:

Please provide a name, phone number, and relationship for a person we can contact in the event of an emergency

We’ve prepared a quick reference guide to provide you with all you need to know, before you go:
  • Contact Information at the Resort (telephone #, address)
  • What to Bring
  • Daily Schedule
  • Diet Restrictions
  • Transportation and Arrival
